languages.text: "Но и чудом безграничной многоформенности Его". {n}Металлическая нотка проскальзывает в голосе Паскаля.{/n}
"But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но и чудом безграничной многоформенности Его". {n}Металлическая нотка проскальзывает в голосе Паскаля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But also is a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}A metallic note slips into Pasqual's voice.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、それは主の無限の多形性の奇跡でもある」 {n}パスカルが金属音を発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、それは主の無限の多形性の奇跡でもある」 {n}パスカルが金属音を発する。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “然而，这台机械也同样代表了祂多态性的奇迹。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统传来了金属般的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “然而，这台机械也同样代表了祂多态性的奇迹。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统传来了金属声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Pero también es un milagro de Su polimorfismo infinito». {n}El tono de Pasqal lleva una nota metálica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero a su vez es un milagro de su polimorfismo infinito». {n}El tono de Pasqal emite una nota metálica.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Aber es ist auch ein Wunder seines grenzenlosen Polymorphismus." {n}Pasqals Stimme hat einen metallischen Unterton.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Wunder seines grenzenlosen Polymorphismus allerdings auch." {n}Pasqals Ton ist von einer metallischen Note durchzogen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mais il s'agit également d'un miracle de son polymorphisme sans limites, » {n}ajoute Pasqal sur un ton métallique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais il s'agit également d'un miracle de son polymorphisme sans limites, » {n}ajoute Pasqal sur un ton métallique.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak aynı zamanda O'nun sınırsız polimorfizminin de bir mucizesi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde metalik bir tını işitiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But it is also a miracle of His boundless polymorphism." {n}Pasqal's voice carries a metallic note.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ancak aynı zamanda O'nun sınırsız polimorfizminin de bir mucizesi." {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde metalik bir tını var.{/n}
